author: Suchita Chakraborty
title: 5 top-ranked golfers committed to The Sentry 2025 ft. Scottie Scheffler
text:
') > -1) { addClass($('.section-container'), 'pill-tag'); } Follow Us Share 0 Discuss 0 Discuss What's your opinion? 5 top-ranked golfers committed to The Sentry 2025 ft. Scottie Scheffler Discuss Now Scottie Scheffler - Source: Imagn The 2025 Sentry Tournament will take place from January 2 to 5 at the Kapalua Plantation Course. The event field is stacked with star PGA Tour players since it's the first event of the next season. The Sentry is the first signature event on the PGA Tour schedule, which means the event will have a limited field and a high payout at stake.
The purse of the event is $20 million and here are the top five highest-ranked players who have the chance to clinch the trophy and the winner's share.
Top 5 golfers who enlisted themselves for the Sentry Tournament #1 Scottie Scheffler
Scottie Scheffler - Source: Imagn images Scottie Scheffler is the World No. 1 and he will be entering the 2025 Sentry Tournament after clinching eight PGA Tour trophies in 2024. His triumphs include the Arnold Palmer Invitational, the Players Championship, the Masters Tournament, and the Tour Championship. The American had a total of 17 top-10 finishes on the tour, including a T3 at the Phoenix Open, a T2 at the Houston Open, and a T2 at the Charles Schwab Challenge.
Trending Scheffler also won the Olympics Men's tournament and received the gold medal after shooting 265 (-19) in total and 67-69-67-62 over the four rounds.
#Xander Schauffele
Xander Schauffele- Source: Imagn Xander Schauffele had two victories in 2024 and the World No. 2 will play at the 2025 Sentry Tournament. In 2024, he played at the Sentry Tournament and finished at T10 with a score of 24 under 268.
Schauffele had a total of 15 top-10 finishes on the 2024 PGA Tour schedule, including a T2 at the Players Championship, a T2 at the Wells Fargo Championship, and another T2 at the FedEx St. Jude Championship. Schauffele also played at the Olympic Men's Golf Competition and finished at T9.
#Rory McIlroy
Rory McIlroy - Source: Getty The World No. 3 Rory McIlroy will play at Kapalua Plantations Course in 2025. The Irishman didn't play at the Sentry Tournament in 2024. McIlroy had one triumph on the 2024 PGA Tour, at the Wells Fargo Championship. Apart from that, he had five top-10 finishes, including a T2 at the US Open, a T3 at the Valero Texas Open, and a T4 at the Genesis Scottish Open.
He also won two events on the DP World Tour, namely the Hero Dubai Desert Classic and the DP World Tour Championship.

author: 小浪财讯
title: 电池50ETF（159796）跌0.82%，半日成交额3498.74万元_新浪财经_新浪网
text:
7月31日，截止午间收盘，电池50ETF（159796）跌0.82%，报0.605元，成交额3498.74万元。电池50ETF（159796）重仓股方面， 阳光电源 截止午盘跌1.15%， 宁德时代 跌2.59%， 三花智控 涨1.24%， 亿纬锂能 跌1.67%， 国轩高科 跌0.37%， 格林美 跌1.81%， 欣旺达 跌0.77%， 先导智能 跌0.62%， 天赐材料 跌1.59%， 科达利 跌0.37%。
电池50ETF（159796）业绩比较基准为中证电池主题指数收益率，管理人为汇添富基金管理股份有限公司，基金经理为董瑾，成立（2022-03-03）以来回报为-38.99%，近一个月回报为3.28%。

author: @ChainCatcher_
title: 数据：比特币现货 ETF 昨日总净流入 4703.83 万美元，持续 5 日净流入
text:
数据：比特币现货 ETF 昨日总净流入 4703.83 万美元，持续 5 日净流入
ChainCatcher 消息，根据 SoSoValue 数据，昨日（美东时间 7 月 30 日）比特币现货 ETF 总净流入 4703.83 万美元。
昨日单日净流入最多的比特币现货 ETF 为贝莱德 (Blackrock） ETF IBIT，单日净流入为 3437.46 万美元，目前 IBIT 历史总净流入达 575.81 亿美元。
其次为 Bitwise ETF BITB，单日净流入为 1266.37 万美元，目前 BITB 历史总净流入达 22.97 亿美元。
截至发稿前，比特币现货 ETF 总资产净值为 1513.65 亿美元，ETF 净资产比率（市值较比特币总市值占比）达 6.49%，历史累计净流入已达 551.07 亿美元。

author: Theodore Bunker
title: Biden on Trump's Christmas Post: 'Love Your Enemies' | Newsmax.com
text: By Theodore Bunker | Thursday, 28 December 2023 03:43 PM EST President Joe Biden on Thursday responded to his predecessor's controversial Christmas message with a reminder to "love your enemies" and "do good to those who hate you." Former President Donald Trump, in one of several Christmas messages released on Truth Social, lashed out at "evil and 'sick' … THUGS we have inside our Country who, with their Open Borders, INFLATION, Afghanistan Surrender, Green New Scam, High Taxes, No Energy Independence, Woke Military, Russia/Ukraine, Israel/Iran, All Electric Car Lunacy, and so much more, are looking to destroy our once great USA. MAY THEY ROT IN HELL. AGAIN, MERRY CHRISTMAS!" Biden, a Catholic who attends church regularly, responded to Trump on X on Thursday, retweeting a link to a news story about Trump's Christmas message with the comment, "There's an expression they say in church sometimes: Love your enemies, do good to those who hate you, bless those who curse you, pray for those who mistreat you." Theodore Bunker, a Newsmax writer, has more than a decade covering news, media, and politics. © 2023 Newsmax. All rights reserved. author: SAPO
title: Galeno confirma saída do FC Porto com mensagem emotiva a Pepê
text:
Galeno confirma saída do FC Porto com mensagem emotiva a Pepê O jogador brasileiro está prestes a rumar ao Al Ahli, da Arábia Saudita, num negócio que deverá render ao FC Porto cerca de 50 milhões de euros.
Extremo esquerdo: Wenderson Galeno © 2024 LUSA - Agência de Notícias de Portugal, S.A. Galeno está mesmo de saída do FC Porto. O jogador deixou uma mensagem emocionada na página de Instagram do companheiro Pepê, confirmando indiretamente a sua saída do clube português.
"Craque demais, foi uma honra jogar ao seu lado, meu irmão. Sentirei saudades", escreveu Galeno, numa publicação que foi rapidamente apagada. Mesmo assim foram muitos os que conseguiram ver a mensagem e o comentário não passou despercebido.
Galeno está prestes a rumar ao Al Ahli, da Arábia Saudita, num negócio que deverá render ao FC Porto cerca de 50 milhões de euros. Este valor representa um encaixe financeiro significativo para os cofres do clube português, que vê assim partir um dos seus principais ativos.
Na sua segunda passagem pelo Dragão, Galeno disputa a quarta temporada consecutiva com a camisola azul e branca. Neste período, o jogador de 27 anos consolidou-se como uma peça importante na equipa, contribuindo com 12 golos e três assistências em 31 jogos disputados nesta temporada.
A saída de Galeno marca o fim de um ciclo no FC Porto, no qual o luso-brasileiro conquistou a confiança da equipa técnica e da claque portista. Agora, o jogador prepara-se para um novo desafio no futebol árabe.
